speaker: agent
text: Ma' am, like this call is just to inform you that like today your Medicare is getting upgraded.

speaker: customer
text: So that's why you are getting some extra benefits from you Medicare at zero additional cost to you.

speaker: agent
text: Hope that sounds good to you.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so ma' am, like these are the new benefits you are getting for the year [DATE_INTERVAL].

speaker: agent
text: And this benefits will, will just apply you for from the next month.

speaker: agent
text: So ma' am, to get this benefit, I will just ask you two to three qualifying questions, like is your Medicare Part A, Part B is active right now.

speaker: agent
text: And ma' am, for the confirmation, like you live in [LOCATION] [LOCATION], [LOCATION], your zip code is [LOCATION], is that correct?

speaker: customer
text: And ma' am, can you please like confirm me?

speaker: agent
text: Do you make your own decisions about your Medicare?

speaker: agent
text: And ma' am, for the confirmation, I have your full name with me.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, so Ms. [PERSON_NAME], like you are qualified to get this new benefits, ma' am.

speaker: agent
text: So right now what I will do, I will just like connect your call, ma' am, to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] who is from your same area, ma' am, from the same zip code.

speaker: customer
text: He will just going to like explain you and after that he was just going to let you know when you will be receiving the paperwork about this benefits so you can read about the benefits as well.

speaker: agent
text: So ma' am, like before connecting a call, I have your address.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, thank you so much for that.

speaker: agent
text: So as I told you, it will take only [DURATION] [DURATION] to connect your call.

speaker: customer
text: And the [OCCUPATION] will take like a minimum [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] to explain everything and I will introduce you to them.

speaker: agent
text: Ma' am, I'm connecting your call.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, please be on the line.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, thank you so much for holding the line.

speaker: customer
text: Hi, [PERSON_NAME], I have Ms. [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] on the line with me.

speaker: agent
text: You may take over the call.
